sourcesContent:
import authentication from "./auth/authentication"
import authorization from "./auth/authorization"
import validateToken from "./auth/validate-token"
import phoneVerification from "./auth/phone-verification"
import userValidator from "./validators/user-validator";

export {
    authentication,
    authorization,
    validateToken,
    phoneVerification,
    userValidator,
}

sourcesContent:
import authentication from "./auth/authentication"
import authorization from "./auth/authorization"
import validateToken from "./auth/validate-token"
import phoneVerification from "./auth/phone-verification"
import userValidator from "./validators/user-validator";

export {
    authentication,
    authorization,
    validateToken,
    phoneVerification,
    userValidator,
